q0:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "TotalCustomers", 
       SUM(CASE WHEN "Currency" = 'EUR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "CustomersEUR", 
       SUM(CASE WHEN "Currency" = 'CZK' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "CustomersCZK"
FROM customers	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
q1:
SELECT c."CustomerID", c."Segment", c."Currency"
FROM customers c
JOIN yearmonth y ON c."CustomerID" = y."CustomerID"
WHERE y."Date" LIKE '2012%' AND c."Segment" = 'LAM'
ORDER BY y."Consumption" ASC
LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
q2:
SELECT AVG("Consumption") AS "AverageMonthlyConsumption"
FROM yearmonth y
JOIN customers c ON y."CustomerID" = c."CustomerID"
WHERE c."Segment" = 'SME' AND y."Date" LIKE '2013%'
GROUP BY c."Segment"	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
q3:
SELECT SUM(y."Consumption") AS "TotalConsumption"
FROM yearmonth y
JOIN customers c ON y."CustomerID" = c."CustomerID"
JOIN transactions_1k t ON c."CustomerID" = t."CustomerID"
JOIN gasstations g ON t."GasStationID" = g."GasStationID"
WHERE c."Currency" = 'CZK' AND strftime('%Y', t."Date") = '2012'

UNION

SELECT SUM(y."Consumption") AS "TotalConsumption"
FROM yearmonth y
JOIN customers c ON y."CustomerID" = c."CustomerID"
JOIN transactions_1k t ON c."CustomerID" = t."CustomerID"
JOIN gasstations g ON t."GasStationID" = g."GasStationID"
WHERE c."Currency" = 'EUR' AND strftime('%Y', t."Date") = '2012'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
